dsl module¶

dsl.TAB_L = 'tab'¶

This module is used to connect the whole application and made the calls to all the different parts that run in the project. It will control the input of the user and show whatever is necessary, then it will call the lexer to check the grammar.

dsl.delete_keys_character_down()[source]¶

This method is used to correct the buffer output when the down arrow is pressed so it does not print its code on the console

Parameters: none

Returns: nothing

@author: Álvaro García Infante

dsl.delete_keys_character_tab()[source]¶

This method is used to correct the buffer output when the tab key is pressed so it does not print its code on the console

Parameters: none

Returns: nothing

@author: Álvaro García Infante

dsl.delete_keys_character_up()[source]¶

This method is used to correct the buffer output when the up arrow is pressed so it does not print its code on the console

Parameters: none

Returns: nothing

@author: Álvaro García Infante

dsl.delete_line(length)[source]¶

This method is used to correct the buffer output when the line needs to be deleted

Parameters: length (int): Length of the line that needs to be deleted

Returns: nothing

@author: Álvaro García Infante

dsl.get_input()[source]¶

This method is created as our own version of the native method input(), the main difference with the mentioned method is that this method does not stop the execution of the machine. We need this in order to access the history of the machine if the user press the arrow keys or to predict the written word if the user press the TAB key.

Parameters: none

Returns: String:Returning string

@author: Álvaro García Infante

dsl.main_loop()[source]¶

This is the main method. It will read the input of the console and then check the grammar with the lexer before calling the interpreter

Parameters: none

Returns: nothing

@author: Álvaro García Infante

dsl.read_input()[source]¶

This method is used to read the console input by lines

Parameters: none

Returns: String:Returning the output

@author: Álvaro García Infante

dsl.start_writing_message()[source]¶

This method is used to inform that the command line is active to receive code by printing the start message

Parameters: none

Returns: nothing

@author: Álvaro García Infante

dsl.welcome_message()[source]¶

This method is used to inform that the application is running by printing the welcome message

Parameters: none

Returns: nothing

@author: Álvaro García Infante

DSL (Lenguaje de Dominio Específico) para configurar un servidor de forma segura
